text: Nombulelo Lilian Hermans (1 January 1970 - 18 January 2021) was a South African politician. She was a member of the African National Congress. She was in a Member of the National Assembly of South Africa from 2019 until her death in 2021. Hermans died from COVID-19 on 18 January 2021. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in South Africa Category:South African MPs
title: Nombulelo Hermans
